lead_paragraph: The release of a recording of Mrs. Clinton’s comments at a private fund-raiser raised questions about the scope of attacks on the Democratic National Committee and the Clinton campaign.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and WILLIAM J. BROAD

headline.print_headline: In Hacked Audio, Clinton Rethinks an Obama Plan
headline.main: In Hacked Audio, Hillary Clinton Rethinks Obama’s Nuclear Upgrade Plan

snippet: The release of a recording of Mrs. Clinton’s comments at a private fund-raiser raised questions about the scope of attacks on the Democratic National Committee and the Clinton campaign....
abstract: Audio recording leaked by member of Hillary Clinton's campaign staff reveals fund-raiser speech in which she voiced doubts about Pres Obama's trillion-dollar plan to modernize country's nuclear arsenal.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
